Package app

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that represents the users of our photo application.
    Author:
    Eshan Wadhwa and Vishal Patel
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User​(java.lang.String userName)
        Constructor for the User. Initializes the person and location tags to the User so that they have some premade tags to add to photos.
        Parameters:
        userName - Name of the user as a string.

    • Method Detail

      • getAvailableTags

        public java.util.List<Tag> getAvailableTags()
        Getter for a list of tags that the user can use.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of available tags for the user.

      • addAvailableTag

        public boolean addAvailableTag​(java.lang.String tagName,
                               boolean isMultiple)
        Method to add a tag to the list of available tags for the user.
        Parameters:
        tagName - Represents the name of the tag to add.
        isMultiple - Represents if the tag can take multiple values (true) or not (false)
        Returns:
        Returns true if the tag was successfully added, and returns false if the tag has the same name as another tag in the list, in which case the addition is not executed.

      • removeAvailableTag

        public boolean removeAvailableTag​(java.lang.String tagName)
        Removes a tag from the list of tags visible to the user.
        Parameters:
        tagName - String of the tag to remove.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the tag was removed. Returns false if the tag was not found, so no removal is done.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • setUserName

        public void setUserName​(java.lang.String userName)
        Setter for user's username.
        Parameters:
        userName - String of the users desired name.

      • addAlbum

        public boolean addAlbum​(Album album)
        Method to add an album to a user.
        Parameters:
        album - This is the Album to associate with the user.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the album is successfully added. Returns false if this album has the same name as another of the user's albums, in which case the add is not executed.

      • delAlbum

        public boolean delAlbum​(int index)
        Deletes an album from the user's list of associated albums.
        Parameters:
        index - Represents the index of the album to delete.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the album was successfully deleted and false if the index is invalid.

      • getAlbum

        public Album getAlbum​(int index)
        Getter for an album.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the album to get.
        Returns:
        Returns the album if found, and returns null if the index is invalid.

      • albumIterator

        public java.util.Iterator<Album> albumIterator()
        Gets the iterator of albums for this user.
        Returns:
        Returns the iterator that can iterate through the albums of this user.

      • getAlbums

        public java.util.List<Album> getAlbums()
        Returns the list of albums for this user.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of albums associated with this user.

      • searchDate

        public java.util.List<Photo> searchDate​(java.time.LocalDateTime early,
                                        java.time.LocalDateTime late)
        Method to search and find photos based on date.
        Parameters:
        early - This is the LocalDateTime instance which represents the start date for the search.
        late - This is the LocalDateTime instance which represents the end date for the search.
        Returns:
        Returns the list of photos which are in the date range.

      • searchTag

        public java.util.List<Photo> searchTag​(java.lang.String tag,
                                       java.lang.String val)
        Method to search for photos based on a single tag value pair.
        Parameters:
        tag - String of the tag to find.
        val - String of the value associated with the tag.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of all photos associated with this user which have this tag and associated value.

      • searchTag

        public java.util.List<Photo> searchTag​(java.lang.String tag1,
                                       java.lang.String val1,
                                       java.lang.String tag2,
                                       java.lang.String val2,
                                       boolean orAnd)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Overloaded method for searchTag, which searches for photos based on two tag-value pairs.
        Parameters:
        tag1 - First tag string name.
        val1 - Value (string) to find associated with the first tag.
        tag2 - Second tag string name.
        val2 - Value (string) to find associated with the second tag.
        orAnd - Boolean that represents if we want to find photos that match both tag-value pairs (false), or match one of the two tag-value pairs (true).
        Returns:
        Returns a list of photos associated with the search.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws an exception if we try to search with both tags being the same tag and the tag cannot support multiple values.

      • removeDuplicate

        public java.util.List<Photo> removeDuplicate​(java.util.List<Photo> photos)
        Helper method that removes duplicate photos in a list of photos.
        Parameters:
        photos - Given list of photos.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of photos which has all the photos of the original list with no duplicates.
